resources.string: Welcome to the eva app. To take a picture, press the required service button at the bottom of the screen. Currency on the right, and reading on the left., To control the flash feature, the pressure on the top of the screen on the right button., After capturing the image, a new screen appears., The screen has a button to return the top left, and the button to score the top right, as well as To the picture.
Sorry, something went wrong, please make sure you are connected to the internet, try again
